body.name: Transparent Plastic Doorbell Rain Cover Suitable For All Ring Models Doorbell Waterproof Protector Shield For Ring 1/2/3/4/2020/Pro/Pro 2/Wired Video Doorbells

features: 【Selected High Quality Materials】Our doorbell rain cover, designed specifically for outdoor doorbells, is made of durable plastic. It provides efficient protection against rain, sun, and UV rays, ensuring the longevity of your doorbell.

【Universal Compatibility】Our all-weather doorbell cover is compatible for Ring 1/2/3/4、Pro/Pro 2 and more video doorbells. It‘s worth noting that compatible doorbells must be within 3.15 inches in width to work properly.

【Prevents Light Glare】Our video doorbell rain cover offers excellent rainproof, sunproof, weatherproof, and anti-glare functions. Say goodbye to glare from the sun and street lights, and enjoy consistent video quality day and night. Your outdoor doorbell is well-protected.

【Protect Battery】Our doorbell rain cover is weather resistant and can withstand a temperature range of -5℉ to 124℉. It can prevent your doorbell's battery from stopping working in the cold or high temperatures.

【Optimal Design】Deepened rainproof eaves at the top, effectively blocking rainwater from eroding the doorbell.Optimized curvature on both sides so as not to block the doorbell camera view.Our design is more reasonable, to provide you with a better user experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cover for my Ring Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: This cover was easy to install and it doesn't obscure our sight. In one of the pictures it shows that it rain and my Ring Doorbell did not get wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great to keep the rain off the Ring…
reviews.reviewText: This product does exactly what it says it does. My only complaints with it is. One is the sun hits it there can be a glare on the Ring camera. Two it is distortive of the view at the very edges on both sides of the cameras range. Third it does make it very difficult to remove the battery to charge it. Other than that I am satisfied with my purchase. I would definitely buy this again. Those 3 issue are in no way deal breakers in my opinion for what the product actually provides. Since I don’t have a porch or any other cover for the Ring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There-are; “No”-dislikes here!This clear-cover shield is a “Must” for your Ring Video Doorbell,..! It keeps the camera lens dry from the elements, ..rain and snow ❄️ I’ve placed a strip of HD, Gorilla 🦍 tape adhesive across the top of this cover to the Ring doorbell exterior mounting frame, and when I need to access the doorbell battery, I simply just lift it up,! (like-a-hinge) and pull out the Ring doorbell out from the mounting shell! and it stays in place! “Simple”!“Raisin-Pie” 👍. Thank-You!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation and clear visuals
reviews.reviewText: I live in Florida and this has been perfect. Took literally a second to install and it has not affected the clarity of the video at all. No fog, no issues. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Doesn't fit perfectly for Blink doorbell camera, but it got the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Transparent Weather Cover For The Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: They say this is made for Ring Video doorbells and such, but I got it simply for the switch on the wireless doorbell on my gate. When I get a delivery, the driver can simply touch the switch so I know he’s there. This clear plastic cover lets him see the switch, and yet protects it from rain and snow. It was simple to mount.It’s quite a lot of money for what you get, though – not sure it’s really worth $28. A star off for that.
